requirements.summary: Create a shared site layout with persistent header navigation and footer across all pages using client-side routing.
acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible on all pages and includes a logo area plus navigation links: Home, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact.
Footer is visible on all pages and contains the restaurant address, phone number, and a social links section (links may be placeholders if URLs are not provided).
Navigation between pages works without full page reloads (client-side routing).

file_operations.description: Create the app root with client-side routing and wire routes for Home, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact to a shared layout wrapper.

Implement the persistent header (including logo + nav links) and footer (address, phone, social links placeholders) and render nested page content via an outlet/children. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card) where appropriate for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the root App component is imported from the created frontend/src/App.tsx and fix the global stylesheet import so styles load on all pages.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with restaurant intro content, opening hours, and Call Now / Order Online CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders the name “Yadav Family Restaurant” and the tagline “Delicious Taste, Family Feel”.
Home page displays the provided welcome message and opening hours (Monday–Sunday: 10:00 AM–11:00 PM).
“Call Now” triggers a phone dial action via a tel: link for +91-9876543210.
“Order Online” button is present; if no URL is provided, it should clearly appear as a button and use a safe placeholder link (e.g., #) without breaking navigation.

file_operations.description: Create the Home page UI with name, tagline, welcome message, opening hours, and CTAs including tel: link for +91-9876543210 and an Order Online placeholder button. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card) for CTA and section layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Home route to render HomePage within the shared SiteLayout and ensure navigation link for Home routes correctly.
Ensure the header navigation includes a Home link and that active/hover states match the site theme. Use shadcn-ui primitives as needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build the About page with founding info, mission statement, and highlights list/cards.
acceptanceCriteria: About page states the restaurant started in 2020 in Meerut.
About page displays the mission statement: “Our mission is to provide quality food at affordable prices.”
About page includes all four highlights as a list or cards: Fresh Ingredients, Clean Kitchen, Family Friendly Environment, Birthday & Party Booking Available.

file_operations.description: Create the About page content including 2020 Meerut origin, mission statement, and the four highlights displayed as a readable list or cards. Use shadcn-ui Card/List styling for highlights; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the About route to render AboutPage within the shared SiteLayout and ensure header navigation points to it.

requirements.summary: Build the Menu page with four categories and exact items/prices with a responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Menu page displays four sections: Veg Items, Non-Veg Items, Breads, Beverages.
Each menu item appears with its exact name and price as provided (including ₹ symbol).
Layout is readable on mobile and desktop (e.g., stacked sections on mobile, grid on larger screens).

file_operations.description: Create the Menu page with sections Veg Items, Non-Veg Items, Breads, Beverages and render the provided items with exact names and ₹ prices, using responsive section/card/grid layout. Use shadcn-ui Card and typography patterns for readability; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Menu route to render MenuPage within the shared SiteLayout and ensure header navigation points to it.

requirements.summary: Build the Gallery page with three labeled sections and responsive locally-served placeholder images.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery page includes three labeled sections: Restaurant Interior Photos, Food Images, Party Celebration Pictures.
Each section displays at least one image card/tile using local static assets (not fetched from the backend).
Images are responsive and maintain aspect ratio without layout breaking.

file_operations.description: Create the Gallery page with the three labeled sections and render local static images from frontend/public/assets/generated, using responsive image tiles/cards with preserved aspect ratio. Use shadcn-ui Card for image tiles if desired; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Gallery route to render GalleryPage within the shared SiteLayout and ensure header navigation points to it.

requirements.summary: Build the Contact page with address, clickable phone/email, and a Google Maps iframe embed without an API key.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays the full address text: “Yadav Family Restaurant, Near Pahelwan Farm, Meerut, Uttar Pradesh”.
Phone number +91-9876543210 is displayed and is clickable via a tel: link.
Email yadavrestaurant@gmail.com is displayed and is clickable via a mailto: link.
A Google Map embed is present on the page (iframe) and does not require an API key.

file_operations.description: Create the Contact page with the provided address, clickable tel: +91-9876543210, clickable mailto: yadavrestaurant@gmail.com, and an iframe Google Maps embed derived from the address text (no API key). Use shadcn-ui components for section framing if helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Contact route to render ContactPage within the shared SiteLayout and ensure header navigation points to it.

Ensure footer includes the same address and phone number presented on Contact page, plus social media placeholder links, styled consistently with the theme. Use shadcn-ui components for link/button styling if needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent warm, restaurant-appropriate visual theme (typography, spacing, colors) across the site and avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography and spacing scale.
Color palette and styling feel restaurant-themed (e.g., warm neutrals/earth tones) and are applied consistently to header, footer, buttons, and section headings.
Theme does not primarily rely on blue/purple as the main brand colors.

file_operations.description: Adjust the global design tokens/CSS variables and base styles to a warm, restaurant-themed palette (earth tones/warm neutrals) and consistent typography/spacing, ensuring the primary brand color is not blue/purple.
Tune Tailwind theme extensions (as needed) to support the warm brand palette and consistent radius/shadows/typography used across header, footer, buttons, and section headings.

Align header/footer styling (backgrounds, borders, link states, buttons) to the global theme for consistent appearance across pages. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent UI patterns; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images as static assets and render them in the header and gallery UI.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
The logo image is rendered in the site header.
Gallery page renders the generated placeholder images from local static assets.

file_operations.description: Add the generated restaurant logo image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/yadav-logo.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated warm hero banner image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/yadav-hero.dim_1600x600.png.
Add the generated placeholder image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-interior-1.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated placeholder image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-food-1.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated placeholder image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-party-1.dim_1200x800.png.

Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/yadav-logo.dim_512x512.png in the persistent header (with accessible alt text). Use shadcn-ui components for header layout if needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/yadav-hero.dim_1600x600.png on the Home page in a responsive manner. Use shadcn-ui components for framing if helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render gallery section images using the local static assets frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-interior-1.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-food-1.dim_1200x800.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-party-1.dim_1200x800.png with responsive sizing and preserved aspect ratios. Use shadcn-ui Card for image tiles if desired; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
